title: Calories in Wendy's Large Fries
meta_description: Discover calories in Wendy's fries large serving, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Natural-cut fries from Wendy's menu; large size (~150g); fried in vegetable oil; no added toppings or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, oil type, portion size, and preparation; values based on standard Wendy's data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A large Wendy's fries contains about 470 calories and 60g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in Wendy's large fries?
What are the carbs in Wendy's fries large?
How much sodium in a large Wendy's fries?
Are Wendy's large fries high in fat?
How does Wendy's fries compare to other fast food large fries?
faqs.a: Similar to competitors at 400-500 kcal; check specific chains for exacts.
